Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE root["StringField"] FROM root WHERE ((root["NumericField"] < @value0) ? true : false)

Input.Description: Filter w/ ternary conditional ? and contains

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE root["StringField"] FROM root WHERE (root["NumericField"] = (ARRAY_CONTAINS(root["ArrayField"], @value0) ? @value1 : @value2))

Input.Description: Filter w/ ternary conditional ? and contains #2

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE root["StringField"] FROM root WHERE (root["NumericField"] = ((root["StringField"] = @value0) ? @value1 : (ARRAY_CONTAINS(root["ArrayField"], @value2) ? @value3 : @value4)))
